commandCooldown: You can use this command again {timer}.
setupSuccess: You have successfully set the guild's settings!
votedAlready: You've already voted in the last 12 hours! You may vote again {timer}.
votedNo: Vote for The Narwhal on Top.gg every 12 hours to earn a prize!
giveawaysNoneActive: There are no active giveaways right now. Please try again later.
itemFedRecently: Youâ€™ve fed The Narwhal recently, please wait for a while to feed me again.
itemFeed: The Narwhal happily takes your {item}, and rewards you with {amount} {reward}!
playSuccess: Yay, that was fun! You earned {amount} {reward}!
redeemSuccess: Yay! You redeemed your {item} and got {amount} {reward}.
movedToSlash: Hi there! We have updated to using Slash Commands instead of regular commands. Try them out today, and let us know in our support server if you have any problems or questions!
giveawayEnter: You have successfully entered the giveaway!
giveawayEntered: You have already entered this giveaway!
giveawayServerLimit: You have reached the limit of servers you may enter in. Try using items to boost your entries instead.
languageSet: Your language has been set to {language}!
setupNotComplete: This server has not been setup yet!
noPermission: You do not have permission to use this command!
notEnoughPrice: You don't have enough {item} to buy that box!
purchaseConfirm: Would you like to purchase this box for {price}?
boxNoItems: Unfortunately, you didn't get anything from this box. Better luck next time!
buttonWrongUser: This button is not for you!
helpDescription:
**The Narwhal** is a bot that runs cross-server Nitro giveaways in __this server__ for free. How does that work? The same giveaway is run in all the servers that use the bot.

It makes servers more active, and gives everyone a chance to win Nitro! Invite the bot to your server by clicking the button below.
cmdDescriptionSetup: Used to set up the bot. (Admin only)
cmdDescriptionPlay: Gives you a random item that could give you more entries in the giveaway.
cmdDescriptionFeed: If you get any fish, you can feed them to The Narwhal using this command.
cmdDescriptionVote: Gives you the link to vote for the bot and gives you prizes for voting.
cmdDescriptionNarwhal: Gives you a random fun fact about Narwhals.
cmdDescriptionConfig: Allows you to change your bot language.
cmdDescriptionOpen: Used to open gift bags and boxes.
cmdDescriptionItem: Gives you information about an item.
cmdDescriptionBuy: Gives you the opportunity to buy any gift bags/boxes for sale.
itemFeedMax: That fish is too big for The Narwhal to eat now, try a smaller fish or wait for the next giveaway!
codeGenDesc:
Welcome to the Code Generator. Here, you can convert your items into a code when requested by staff.
Use the buttons below to add items to your code!
codeMissingItems:
Unfortunately, you don't have enough items to finish the code.
You are missing the following items: {items}
winnerDm: You won {prize}! You have 12 hours to claim your prize, and you can do so by joining the Narwhal server and opening a ticket there!
